text: The 1934–35 international cricket season was from September 1934 to April 1935. Result |- | Test 238 || 8–10 January || Jackie Grant || Bob Wyatt || Kensington Oval, Bridgetown || by 4 wickets |- | Test 239 || 24–28 January || Jackie Grant || Bob Wyatt || Queen's Park Oval, Port of Spain || by 217 runs |- | Test 240 || 14–18 February || Jackie Grant || Bob Wyatt || Bourda, Georgetown || Match drawn |- | Test 241 || 14–18 March || Jackie Grant || Bob Wyatt || Sabina Park, Kingston || by an innings and 161 runs |} ==References== Category:International cricket competitions by season Category:1934 in cricket Category:1935 in cricket
title: International cricket in 1934–35
